casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ben Lee CAPPS 206A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2019 Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Capps, Ben Lee. Michelle F. Lynch, GAL Appellate Counsel, Vinston Walton, Associate Attorney General, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of June 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of June 2019."
